meanings.definition: A machine for registering and indicating the total amount of bets placed on a race or other event.
meanings.sent1: The totalizator displayed the amount of money bet on the horse race.
meanings.sent2: People gathered around the totalizator to see the latest betting numbers.
meanings.sent3: The totalizator seemed to have a mind of its own, ticking away as bets were placed.
meanings.sent4: The totalizator hummed softly, like a busy bee tallying up the bets.
meanings.sent5: The bright lights of the totalizator made it the center of attention at the racetrack.

meanings.definition: A system of betting on horse races in which the aggregate stake, less a percentage for the management, is paid out to winners.
meanings.sent1: The totalizator calculated the winnings for each lucky bettor at the end of the race.
meanings.sent2: Fans eagerly awaited the results of the totalizator to see if their horse had won.
meanings.sent3: In a twist of fate, the totalizator accidentally paid out double to the wrong winner.
meanings.sent4: The totalizator's payouts were like magic, turning small bets into big wins.
meanings.sent5: The totalizator's chime signaled another successful payout to a delighted spectator.
